name: Wai-not-makahiki
tagline: Repository for Makahiki Build and Wai Not Widget
body:
# Welcome to the Wai Not? Widget Application!



![IMG2](https://raw.github.com/justinslee/Wai-Not-Makahiki/master/images/CurrentImage.png)

# Information: 

"Wai Not?" is a widget add-on that is built on top of the Makahiki open source project.  It combines various game aspects to create a fun learning environment.  The goal of the game is to teach about water conservation while developing a widget that is capable of use for other resources. 
  
### Current Development:
Currently the development has not been progressed that much.  Most of the project is still under construction.   The current instance of the project has the Quiz almost ready for gameplay testing.  
See the [Gameplay](https://github.com/justinslee/Wai-Not-Makahiki/wiki/Gameplay) documentation for details about the current development. 


# Project Details: 
Link to App:  http://makahiki-wai.herokuapp.com/landing/
